custom-sql.sql: SELECT c.content_type, COUNT(id) as active_count FROM `chola_contentuniqueinformation` c LEFT JOIN `cholacontentusernotification` p ON c.content_id = p.content_id AND p.userid=? AND c.udflag!=0 AND p.flag!=2 GROUP BY c.content_type;

select c.id,c.userid,c.content_id,p.content_type,p.notification_text,p.pageurl FROM cholacontentusernotification c,chola_contentuniqueinformation p where p.content_type=? and c.userid=? and p.content_id=c.content_id and c.flag=1 and c.contentstatus!=0;
